original_text: And it came to pass, that when David was come to the top of the mount, where he worshipped God, behold, Hushai the Archite came to meet him with his coat rent, and earth upon his head:
korean_text: 다윗이 하나님을 경배하는 마루턱에 이를 때에 아렉 사람 후새가 옷을 찢고 흙을 머리에 덮어쓰고 다윗을 맞으러 온지라

sentences.original_text: that when David was come to the top of the mount
behold, Hushai Archite came to meet him
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 후새 아르뎃 사람이 그를 만나러 왔다
